channel.title: Comments on: Beyond Berlin: Scotland and the question of borders
channel.description: See Berlin through a lens of migration and difference

item.title: By: opa
item.dc:creator: opa
item.description: Soeffgen,I saw you growing up and I am more than happy to see you a thinking and tolerant lady.You always had this talent for writing and you prove it over and over.Can you imagine how proud I am to have you as a granddaughter?
item.content:encoded:
Soeffgen,I saw you growing up and I am more than happy to see you a thinking and tolerant lady.You always had this talent for writing and you prove it over and over.Can you imagine how proud I am to have you
as a granddaughter?
